data.Name: Teenage Wrist
data.Bio: Teenage Wrist is an American alternative rock band from Los Angeles that formed in 2014 by Kamtin Mohager (bass, vocals), Anthony Salazar (drums) and Marshall Gallagher (guitars, vocals). In 2015 the band released their debut EP Dazed. In late 2017, they announced they had signed to Epitaph Records, the label published the bands first full length album, Chrome Neon Jesus in 2018. In 2019, founding member Kamtin Mohager departed from the band. In 2021, the group's second album Earth is a Black Hole was released. Read more on Last.fm
